article_title: China Allows Preferred Stock, Offering Fresh Funding Channel
article_text:
China unveiled measures on Friday to let companies raise funds by selling preferred stock, a move that would offer cash-hungry firms struggling with a slowing economy a new way of getting capital.

The long-anticipated rollout of the new product will "reform" China's capital market, the China Securities Regulatory Commission said. Moreover, the measure will deepen the country's access to capital and bring more financing...
